name: Operation Saving the New Year
description:
You are an agent of Santa and you have been assigned a task-to go to a place called "the land of Misery", where you have to return the festive and cheerful mood that has long been frozen in that area...

EXPLANATION OF GAME MECHANICS

In the game you can use 3 types of weapons (2 are available initially).

"Snowball" (1) shoots ordinary snowballs,

Baseball bat (F) — melee + reflection of snowballs (you need to get into the timing),

Flamethrower (2) shoots fire.

The snow

If you interact with them (E) you will have snow to use "Snowball".

Reflection

To reflect enemy projectile you need just to click attack button (LMB) using Baseball bat.
